detailed_description:
GET THE LATEST VERSION OF MADDEN


Madden NFL 22 MVP Edition

Purchase Madden NFL 22 MVP Edition and receive:

  • Franchise: 40 Staff Points
  • Face of the Franchise & The Yard: The General Player Class starting at level 10 with a Tom Brady Gear Capsule
  • Madden Ultimate Team:
    • Choice of Brady or Mahomes Elite Item
    • 11 Team Fantasy Packs
All-new features in Franchise include staff management, an enhanced season engine, and weekly strategy. Share avatar progress and player class between Face of the Franchise and The Yard with unified progression. And for the first time ever in Ultimate Team, adjust Superstar X-Factors at halftime.

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.
